title: Version naming convention
details:
The repository uses a specific version naming scheme with `-vXX` suffixes, NOT `v1.6.X.Y` format. For example:
- v1.6.3.4 (base version)
- v1.6.3.4-v2 (second iteration)
- v1.6.3.4-v10 (tenth iteration)
- v1.6.3.4-v11 (current version)

There is NO v1.6.4 version. The incorrect v1.6.4.X labels were fixed to the proper format in this refactoring task.
